text: (napiyē!) Itupaṟṟiya muḻu viparamum umakku vantu cērnta piṉṉarum evarēṉum oruvar um'miṭam itaik kuṟittu tarkkam ceytāl; "vāruṅkaḷ! Eṅkaḷ putalvarkaḷaiyum, uṅkaḷ putalvarkaḷaiyum; eṅkaḷ peṇkaḷaiyum, uṅkaḷ peṇkaḷaiyum; eṅkaḷaiyum uṅkaḷaiyum aḻaittu (oṉṟu tiraṭṭi vaittuk koṇṭu)'poyyarkaḷ mītu allāhviṉ cāpam uṇṭākaṭṭum' eṉṟu nām pirārttippōm!" Eṉa nīr kūṟum
